Uses of Interface
org.jvoicexml.ImplementationPlatform

Packages that use ImplementationPlatform
org.jvoicexml This package contains the user relevant interfaces and classes to interact with the JVoiceXML VoiceXML interpreter. 
org.jvoicexml.implementation This package contains the basic classes and interfaces for the implementation platform. 
org.jvoicexml.interpreter This package contains the core interpreter. 
 

Uses of ImplementationPlatform in org.jvoicexml
 

Methods in org.jvoicexml that return ImplementationPlatform
 ImplementationPlatform ImplementationPlatformFactory.getImplementationPlatform(RemoteClient client)
          Factory method to retrieve an implementation platform for the given calling device.
